TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Style extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class Style Inherits Component Implements IStateManager
public ref class Style : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type Style = class inherit Component interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 Web 服务器控件的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装的属性，控制 Web 服务器控件的外观可以应用于多个 Web 服务器控件，以提供通用外观。The class encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a Web server control and can be applied to multiple Web server controls to provide a common appearance. 可以通过设置中指定的背景色和字体颜色的控件和属性，分别。You can specify the background color and font color of a control by setting the and properties, respectively. 可以显示边框的控件，你可以控制的边框宽度、 边框样式和边框颜色通过设置， ，和属性。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. 此外可以通过使用指定的 Web 服务器控件的大小和属性。The size of a Web server control can also be specified by using the and properties. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

span.span: This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呈现特性和客户端上的 Web 服务器控件的样式，通常调用和方法来插入每个特性和样式单独到输出流。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化过程，此方法封装了对所有调用和对于每个属性和与 Web 服务器控件关联的样式的方法。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有特性和样式都插入到在单个方法调用的输出流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl owner);

summary.span: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

span.span: This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呈现特性和客户端上的 Web 服务器控件的样式，通常调用和方法来插入每个特性和样式单独到输出流。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化过程，此方法封装了对所有调用和对于每个属性和与 Web 服务器控件关联的样式的方法。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web Server control. 所有特性和样式都插入到在单个方法调用的输出流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式类的输出流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建派生自的类类。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 基实现方法被重写，以添加到派生的类中相应的特性输出流。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the Web server control.

value.span: 表示控件背景色的 。

span.span: A that represents the background color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的背景色。Use the property to specify the background color of the Web server control. 此属性使用设置对象。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将只为某些呈现控件。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和将呈现此属性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它还将适用于，和如果其`RepeatLayout`属性是`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 一般情况下，仅呈现为``标记可以显示的背景色 HTML 3.2 中而几乎任何控件可以在 HTML 4.0。In general, only controls that render as a `
` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.控件的呈现为``标记 (包括，所有验证控件和列表控件使用其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`)，此属性将在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 或更高版本，但不是工作Microsoft Internet explorer 版本 4。For controls that render as a `` tag (including , all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 or later, but not for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web server control. 此属性使用设置对象。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将只为某些呈现控件。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和将呈现此属性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它还将适用于， ，和如果其`RepeatLayout`属性是`RepeatLayout.Table`而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for , , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table` and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 但是，呈现为`bordercolor`属性，所有浏览器中可能无效。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which may not work in all browsers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the Web server control.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |边框样式Border Style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置的边框样式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|无边框No border| |`Dotted`|虚线边框。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|点划线边框。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|实线边框。A solid line border.| |`Double`|双实线边框。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状边框。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|用于凸起边框外观的突起边框。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|用于凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|用于凸起控件外观的外嵌边框。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 此属性将不会呈现在某些浏览器。This property will not render on some browsers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of the Web server control.

value.span: ，表示 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

span.span: A that represents the border width of a Web server control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定控件的边框宽度。Use the property to specify a border width for a control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性并不适用于所有 Web 服务器控件。This property does not work with all Web server controls. 它仅适用于这些控件将显示为表，如和。It only applies to controls that display as a table, such as and . 此属性设置与对象。This property is set with a object. 如果属性包含负号，将引发异常。If the property of the contains a negative number, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅可以以对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 的浏览器的像素为单位表示的边框宽度。The border width can only be expressed in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5. 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更高版本中支持所有单元类型。All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later. 请参阅特定控件有关的详细信息。Refer to the specific control for details. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 将指定 的样式属性复制到从中调用此方法的 类的实例。

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法重复的样式属性的指定到的实例从中调用此方法的类。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. 使用注册样式时，然后将复制使用，则只属性复制到目标，并非所有的各个属性。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 如果你然后复制或检查目标样式的属性，这可能导致意外的结果。This could lead to unexpected results if you then copy or examine the properties of the destination style. 例如，如果你使用从中复制字体信息属性注册，不会因样式得到的字体的单个设置。For example, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. > [!CAUTION] > 所有属性，包括已设置的当前实例中的那些类中，将替换为中的关联属性指定的`s`参数。All properties, including those that have been set in the current instance of the class, will be replaced by the associated property in the specified by the `s` parameter.

span.span: has been set.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 Web 服务器控件在客户端呈现的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: The CSS class rendered by the Web server control on the client.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web server control. 此属性将呈现在浏览器中的所有控件。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 它将始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。It will always be rendered as the `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. 例如，假设有以下 Web 服务器控件声明：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 以下 HTML 呈现在客户端以前的 Web 服务器控件声明上：The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性将产生任何影响。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect.

public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::FontInfo ^ Font { System::Web::UI::WebControls::FontInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与 Web 服务器控件关联的字体属性。

span.span: Gets the font properties associated with the Web server control.

value.span: ，表示 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。

span.span: A that represents the font properties of the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。Use the property to specify the font properties of the Web server control. 此属性包含可访问的子属性以声明方式以形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以编程方式中的窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`). 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件之前的浏览器中将呈现所有但一个子属性。All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls. 它们是： ， ， ， ， ， ，和(但仅如名为字体大小`Small`， `Smaller`，依此类推，起作用)。They are: , , , , , , and (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work). > [!NOTE] > 虽然这些子属性呈现在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 之前的浏览器中，是不同于在更高版本浏览器中呈现的 HTML。Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than in later browsers. 而不是呈现为样式特性，这些子属性呈现为 HTML 元素，如``和``。Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `` and ``. 将不会呈现在某些浏览器的一个子属性是。One subproperty that will not render on some browsers is . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 Web 服务器控件的前景色。Use the property to specify the foreground color of the Web server control. 前景色通常是文本的颜色。The foreground color is usually the color of the text. 此属性将呈现在浏览器上早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件，除了， ，和。This property will render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls, except the , , and . > [!NOTE] > 在不支持样式的浏览器，此属性呈现为 FONT 元素。On browsers that do not support styles, this property is rendered as a FONT element. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用要同时更改多个控件的样式属性的对象。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次之一属性值发生更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持的特定属性，属性值发生更改时，也不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
